headline: Palantir’s Record AIP Growth Meets Lofty Valuation And Global Ambitions
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) reported its strongest-ever growth rates alongside blowout quarterly earnings. The Artificial Intelligence Platform (AIP) saw sharp adoption, with U.S. commercial operations contributing heavily to overall results. The company expanded partnerships in Asia with HD Hyundai and in Europe with Sovereign AI and Accenture. These developments highlight growing international interest in Palantir's AI infrastructure beyond government contracts. Palantir has...
